sentences.text: On 25 February 2025, a Sudanese Air Force Antonov An-26 crashed into a residential area in Omdurman, Sudan, shortly after takeoff from Wadi Seidna Air Base. At least 46 fatalities have been confirmed by Sudanese authorities.

references.text: <ref>{{cite news |last=Orban |first=André |title=Sudan military plane crash kills 46 amid intensifying conflict |url=https://www.aviation24.be/manufacturers/antonov/sudan-military-plane-crash-kills-46-amid-intensifying-conflict/ |access-date=26 February 2025 |work=Aviation24.be |date=26 February 2025 }}</ref>

<ref name="bbc">{{Cite news |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudan military plane crashes in residential area |url=https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/clyn914g249o |access-date=26 February 2025 |work=BBC News }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Sudanese military has been engaged in a Sudanese civil war (2023–present)|conflict against the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) since April 2023, resulting in a widespread humanitarian crisis.

references.text: <ref name=":3"/> As of February 2025, nearly 13 million people are thought to be displaced.<ref>{{Cite web |date=25 February 2025 |title=Maps show Sudan conflict's shifting frontlines as SAF regains territory |url=https://news.sky.com/story/maps-show-sudan-conflicts-shifting-frontlines-as-saf-regains-territory-13316893 |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=Sky News }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |last=Owoseni |first=Opeyemi |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudanese Military Plane Crash Kills 46 in Khartoum Outskirts |url=https://www.tv360nigeria.com/sudanese-military-plane-crash-kills-46-in-khartoum-outskirts/ |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=TV360 Nigeria |language=en-GB }}</ref>

sentences.text: Sudan is considered to have a poor aviation safety record, largely due to poor maintenance and aging aircraft.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Death toll in Sudan military plane crash rises to 46 |url=https://apnews.com/article/sudan-war-miliary-rsf-4311a36df4d48680770253a8bf13dcff |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=AP News |language=en }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |last=Orton |first=Daniel |date=26 February 2025 |title=At least 46 dead in military plane crash |url=https://www.newsweek.com/least-46-dead-military-plane-crash-2036425 |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=Newsweek |language=en }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Antonov An-26 had been reported to be carrying several high-ranking officers of the Sudanese Armed Forces and a crew alongside civilians.

references.text: <ref name=":2">{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Death toll in Sudan military plane crash rises to 46 |url=https://apnews.com/article/sudan-war-miliary-rsf-4311a36df4d48680770253a8bf13dcff |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=AP News }}</ref>

sentences.text: It was reportedly on its way to Port Sudan. Among the passengers were Senior Commander Major General Bahr Ahmed, a high-ranking commander who was formerly the commander of forces in the capital Khartoum and senior military officer Lt. Col. Awad Ayoub.

references.text: <ref name="tribune">{{Cite web |date=25 February 2025 |title=Sudanese military plane crashes in Omdurman, killing crew, civilians on ground |url=https://sudantribune.com/article297916/ |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=Sudan Tribune }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Death toll in Sudan military plane crash rises to 46 |url=https://krdo.com/news/2025/02/26/death-toll-in-sudan-military-plane-crash-rises-to-46/ |access-date=26 February 2025 |publisher=KRDO-TV|KRDO |language=en }}</ref>

sentences.text: The aircraft crashed at around 20:40 local time, shortly after takeoff from Wadi Seidna Air Base into a house in Block 75 of the al-Thawra housing area in the Al-Iskan area of Karary District|Karari, Omdurman. Eyewitnesses reported that the plane was flying at relatively low altitude before it plummeted and caught fire. Military sources told ''Reuters'' that a technical failure was the likely cause.

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=27 February 2025 |title=Antonov crash in northern Omdurman kills at least 19 people |url=https://www.dabangasudan.org/en/all-news/article/antonov-crash-in-northern-omdurman-kills-at-least-19-people |access-date=27 February 2025 |website=Radio Dabanga }}</ref>

<ref name=":2"/><ref name=":4">{{Cite news |last=Alamin |first=Mohammed |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudanese Army Plane Crashes Near Capital, Killing at Least 46 |url=https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-02-26/sudanese-army-plane-crashes-near-capital-killing-at-least-46 |access-date=26 February 2025 |work=Bloomberg }}</ref>

<ref name=":0">{{Cite web |date=25 February 2025 |title=Officers killed in Sudan plane crash: Military source |url=https://english.ahram.org.eg/NewsContent/2/8/541119/World/Region/Officers-killed-in-Sudan-plane-crash-Military-sour.aspx |access-date=25 February 2025 |website=Ahram Online }}</ref>

<ref name=":1">{{Cite web |date=25 February 2025 |title=Several Officers, Civilians Killed In Sudan Military Plane Crash: Report |url=https://www.ndtv.com/world-news/several-officers-civilians-killed-in-sudan-military-plane-crash-report-7795659 |access-date=25 February 2025 |website=NDTV |language=en }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudanese military plane crashes north of capital Khartoum, causing deaths |url=https://english.news.cn/africa/20250226/450dcd80728b4d83b086077822a58d46/c.html |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=Xinhua }}</ref>

<ref name=":3">{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudan: More than 40 killed in military plane crash |url=https://www.dw.com/en/sudan-more-than-40-killed-in-military-plane-crash/a-71752996 |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=dw.com }}</ref>

sentences.text: Twenty-nine civilians on the ground were also reported to be killed in the crash, while damage was reported to nearby residential homes in the neighborhood the plane crashed in. Among the dead were women and children. The crash also caused power outages in nearby neighborhoods.<ref name="bbc"/> An additional 10 people were wounded.<ref name=":4"/>

references.text: <ref>{{Cite web |date=25 February 2025 |title=Sudanese military plane crash in Omdurman kills senior officers |url=https://www.albawaba.com/news/sudanese-military-plane-crash-omdurman-1600460 |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=Al Bawaba }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |date=26 February 2025 |title=Sudanese military plane crashes in Omdurman, crew killed |url=https://www.thenews.com.pk/latest/1286536-sudanese-military-plane-crashes-in-omdurman-crew-killed |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=The News }}</ref>

<ref>{{Cite web |last=Magdy |first=Samy |date=26 February 2025 |title=19 killed in Sudan military plane crash after aircraft's takeoff |url=https://abcnews.go.com/International/wireStory/19-killed-sudan-military-plane-crash-after-aircrafts-119197809 |access-date=26 February 2025 |website=ABC News |language=en }}</ref>

sentences.text: The Sudanese Health Ministry stated that search efforts were underway.

references.text: <ref name=":3"/> Firefighters put out a fire confined to the location.<ref>{{Cite web |last=Peters |first=Luke |date=27 February 2025 |title=Sudanese military aircraft crashes on take-off killing 46 |url=https://www.aerotime.aero/articles/sudan-military-antonov-accident-multiple-fatalities |access-date=27 February 2025 |website=Aerotime |language=en-US }}</ref>
